name: readap-js
description: High-level JavaScript/TypeScript client for OpenDAP data access

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-wasm
scripts.copy-wasm: mkdir -p dist/wasm && cp ../readap-wasm/pkg/readap_wasm_bg.wasm dist/wasm/ && cp ../readap-wasm/pkg/readap_wasm.js dist/wasm/ && cp ../readap-wasm/pkg/readap_wasm_bg.js dist/wasm/ && cp ../readap-wasm/pkg/readap_wasm.d.ts dist/wasm/

author: Matthew Iannucci <mpiannucci@gmail.com>
